author: Sean O'Kane
title: Tesla’s shrinking its workforce at the Gigafactory in Nevada because of the coronavirus
description: The headcount at the massive battery factory will drop by ‘more than 75 percent,’ according to an email from one of Tesla’s vice presidents. Nevada’s governor recently issued a shelter-in-place advisory as the state tries to stop the spread of the novel coron…
content:
By more than 75 percent
Photo by Becca Farsace / The Verge
One week after Tesla said it would keep up normal operations at the Gigafactory in Nevada, the company now plans to scale back the workforce there by more than 75 percent as the state shelters in pl… [+2975 chars]
